translations: v．（尤指男子）盯着看，色迷迷地看：用色迷迷的眼神长时间地盯着看，通常指男子对女子的这种行为。
· He ogles at every attractive woman who walks by.
每当有漂亮女人经过，他都会色迷迷地盯着看。

sentences.sentence: Tom ogles on a pretty boy.
sentences.translation: 汤姆给一个靓仔抛媚眼。

sentences.sentence: Dead right! She always gives ogles to handsome boys.
sentences.translation: 对极了！她总是对英俊小生抛媚眼。

sentences.sentence: But Ogles says there are definite mental health benefits to setting and meeting a challenge.
sentences.translation: 但是欧歌儿说设定和实现挑战肯定有益于精神健康。
